website_summaries.verdict: A convenient, easy-to-use seat cover that comes in front and back seat options. An affordable choice that may not work for all pets.
pros: An inexpensive seat cover designed for a front seat
Easy to put in place and remove
Quilted material is waterproof and easy to clean
Company also offers a back seat style cover
cons: Some owners wish it provided more coverage for the side of the seat
Has the tendency to slip, especially when large, active dogs are on it

customer_reviews.title: A must have for your puppy!
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to put on and take off. Love this product, I will have to share there has no accidents so I can’t rate for that, keeps hair, dirty pawn, and nails off the seat. Only mistake I did was I should have bought two.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Placencia

customer_reviews.title: Not Universal
customer_reviews.text: Blah.... 1 should never really label something as Universal when it can't even fit a seat right. This thing 'barely' fits my Prius V front seats. The back portion is too narrow and the seat portion is a bit too small on all corners..(probably because my seat has curved barrier on the sides) I find myself always rearranging it because it always slides off the seat. This will probably work on a 'flat' seat but if not, look elsewhere. Needs the title and description changed as this is obviously NOT universal fitment approved.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent new car protection
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these for my new SUV to cover the front seats. I don’t actually own any pets, but based on how my old car looked, I’m just as messy as one. I didn’t want to risk staining my new seats but also didn’t want the cheap stretchy material covers that go around the entire front and back. These seemed like a good alternative. They are very easy to install and cover the seat completely. They are durable and don’t move around a lot. Great protection for spills and messes. For the price it can’t be beat. Every new car owner needs these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These were super easy to install. They fit perfectly on my 2015 subaru forester seats. I like that they have flaps that fold down the sides, as well. Someone put a lot of thought into the details on these seat covers. If you have larger seats that a Subaru Forester, I doubt they'd fit as well. Nice quality, no odor, sturdy, doesn't slide on the leather seats. A great bargain! The only thing I wish they'd include were seat head rest covers. My dog slobbers far and wide. I need something that covers every conceivable surface including the headliner.
customer_reviews.author: kateisaredhead

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable Seat Cover for your vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: This an excellent way to protect your leather seats when your pet is traveling with you. Keeps my Maltese from scratching my seats when he's with me. I like the material because it's EASY CARE! It's really well made so I recommend this to anyone who has a pet that's likes to go with them.
customer_reviews.author: Dana L. Booth

customer_reviews.title: Used in front seat of Infiniti QX56 with German Shephard
customer_reviews.text: We use this in the front seat of our Infiniti QX56 with a German Shephard. It fits great. It is very durable. We currently only use it to transport the dog to the doggy wash and back. He wears a body seat belt as he sits on this. If space allowed in the vehicle, we would transport him in a crate, but unfortunately, with this vehicle it is not an option. So, I purchased this seat cover. I absolutely LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: My car has cloth seats and I’ve been looking for something to protect my seats. And although these are pet covers i find that it’s more durable and more protective than the regular seat covers. Plus I’m always with my son and nephews so this works great. I love to kee my things clean so this is a great fit. Easy to put.
customer_reviews.author: Nobriskha

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cover
customer_reviews.text: I have leather seats in my car and I drive alone and put everything on the passenger seat. I was afraid of ruining, scratching etc... the seat. I also let my dog sit in the seat. This was the perfect solution for the perfect price. I have a large SUV and it fit just fine. Bought one for my car also and it fit there also. I really like it. Good quality and does what it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Ross

customer_reviews.title: Fits Even Dificult Seats!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product for the price, great durable material and I have a hard to fit car... I would give it a 4.8... the bottom fits a tad funny but fully functional and I really like it. I have a 2007 Ford Mustang Delux and it fits the seats... I have a race style bucket seat and I like how it fits. The straps are long enough that it doesn’t pinch my leather on the sides of the seat and ruin them over time. The material doesn’t slide in my leather it sticks right to it! Going to buy a second for the drivers side!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Owens

customer_reviews.title: Not my thing.
customer_reviews.text: Decent product, but it fits weird. One almost has to be a gymnast to make this work. I’m sure that’s the nature of products like this, so not the fault of the company. I would rather make my own temporary seat cover with sheets, blankets, and/or towels. When sitting on it, the part around the headrest is pulling the headrest. And the bottom part gets in the way of the seat adjustment controls.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn A Rogers

customer_reviews.title: This will save the seats from my beagle and his claws!
customer_reviews.text: I just installed the first on I purchased on the passenger seat of the Porsche, and came into the house, and ordered one for the drivers side. I didn't think when I ordered the first one, that when I am out of the car, the dog could move to the drivers side. Now when I install the second one installed I don't have to worry about that happening. Big savings from those sharp claws!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: William L. Charlton

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit securely, pet can slip around while you're driving
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit my seat right (front passenger seat of a Toyota Sienna). Also, the straps that loop around the back of the seat are in the mid-back area instead of where the back meets the bottom part, so when affixed to the seat, the bottom where your pet sits can still move around a lot. And there's no anti-slip stuff on the underside.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but doesn't really fit our 2015 Highlanders captain chairs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and is waterproof, with the recent snowy conditions this helped keep the leather seats clean. Hopefully it is durable, but so far it is easy to wipe down. The seat pan does move around and needs some adjustment since the wrap around interferes with the seat belt anchor. For the price, I can live with it not being a perfect fit. Will be ordering a second one to fit both second row captain chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Yoshi!725Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Not for dog fur...it gets trapped.
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I bought a back seat cover in this same material but didnt realize it. If you have dogs I wouldn't buy this. The hair gets caught in between the materials. its water resistant but not fur the last 2 pics are of my rear seat cover which is made of the same stuff. once dirt and fur gets on it a wipe away is not possible it's very pointless using this material. WILL RETURN
customer_reviews.author: Allabout_ya_ya

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my third cover and favorite so far. It does get jumbled up, but really easy to get back in place. Easy to remove/wash/put back. I have an 80lb dog that comes to work with me everyday with a 75 minute commute each way. It’s worked great so far. Wish I would have found this prior to him ruining my seats.....
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Fits Honda CR-V!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought a few of these in the last couple years.. they seem pretty similar but slightly different. This one covers more of the seat than the previous one. It’s in a Honda CR-V and it could even cover seats are that a little bigger than mine. It functions as it should - protects the seats. Use it for my dog who is my main pawsenger! Cheap enough to where I can replace them every 6-8 mos or so! (Will add more pics at a later time).
customer_reviews.author: MAJORTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% waterproof....
customer_reviews.text: Bought to protect seats in new car - put to test for first time today after a walk in the park. Although a dry day its wet under foot so dogs paws muddy. Took covers off to wash them to see black marks on car seat. Don't know if it's the wet mud that has gone through or whether it marks from wet rubber on underside of cover, either way not happy.
customer_reviews.author: maylen perez

customer_reviews.title: Do You Struggle Vaccuming Dog Glitter Out Of Your Vehicle?
customer_reviews.text: Then you will love this seat cover! I own a lab/pibble mix and dog glitter is just part of life. No matter how many blankets or towels I would tuck around her seat, her hair found its way into the seat fabric. This seat cover has been a wonderful truck accessory! It blocks dirt, sand, hair, snoogies - all of it stays on the cover and off the seat. To clean it, I just take it out and give it a good shake.
customer_reviews.author: H. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and durable
customer_reviews.text: Love this dog seat cover. Very durable and spill proof. Easy to install and fits great. Actually good seat cover whether you’re a dog or human. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mrbh

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not waterproof as advertised. I recently took off all the covers I bought to wash them and found stains all over my car seats. They did not protect my car seats at all. I had to spend $60 to get all my car seats deep cleaned and they still show faint stains.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Ballweber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect timing
customer_reviews.text: Didnt fully cover bottom part of my bmw coupe but it was okay for me i dont really need the flaps at the bottom Soon i put this in my car took my dog out she puked all over the seat cover saved me from an expensive car detail THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Качественный продукт !
customer_reviews.text: Easily installed a seat cover on my BMW X5 E70 !! The quality of the material is good, while boarding and disembarking from the car the covers do not move !! waterproof !! good price and fast delivery !! ...I can’t say about strength yet, as I installed it two days ago !!!
customer_reviews.author: jalil m.

customer_reviews.title: seat cover
customer_reviews.text: driving home, wet with sweat, from the gym or the park, was soiling my car seats. i would lay a towel on the seat and it would slide off! decided to try these. they are easy to put on, just what was needed.
customer_reviews.author: sunni weathers-n-georgia

customer_reviews.title: 2009 Infiniti G37x - seat covers for 100 degrees
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to withstand 100 degrees and not heat up! I decided to go with this pet cover because most car seat covers are made of faux leather but I want something made out of cloth. This material is polyester, and is cheaper than car covers and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mo-Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Pets or Kids
customer_reviews.text: I dont have pets, i have kids and used it to protect my seats both front and back. They are great covers easy to wipe down if anything spills. The only thing, the front covers slide a little. Ive had this product for over 6 months and still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Melodee M

customer_reviews.title: Great price and good product
customer_reviews.text: The seat covers fit perfectly in my 2017 Yukon bucket seats. They will protect the leather from my dogs when they ride in the car. I simply tether my dog’s into their harness n go! Great price and good product.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great seat cover!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this seat cover. Easy to install and protects my new car’s seat. Dog seems to slid around slightly if he is standing up while I’m driving. I like that it covers part of the sides of the seat as well to really protect it. Great seat cover.
customer_reviews.author: kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping my car seats clean.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is made of thick, high quality material and cross stitching so it isn't easy to tear. It isn't bulky, and really, doesn't look that out of place that it cheapens the look of my car interior. Works perfectly for the front seat in Honda Civic. Perfect for keeping my car seats clean. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: User4Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Good at first!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the way this fit onto the front passenger seat of my Nissan Rogue, and it seemed to keep my seat clean, however, after taking it off and trying to get it back on, it doesn’t fit the same way, and the sides don’t cover and lay still like they did. Not sure if it shrank in the heat or what.
customer_reviews.author: Persephone

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: This worked out great to have my small Min Pin up front with for the ride to the vet. With the non-slip backing, he was able to sit comfortably without sliding around. I've only used this one time but it's a keeper for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria J. Seeders

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This seat cover is a little small for my Chevy Tahoe seat but works fine. After looking at other seat covers that look exactly like this one only higher in price, I would recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Used this cover for my son who plays baseball (he's like Pig-Pen from Charlie Brown after practice/games). Fit is excellent (honda ridgeline) and quite easy to dust off, my only quip is the handle is made of hard plastic and it can get uncomfortable if you sit on it (i guess animals don't mind)...
customer_reviews.author: Kinzo

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I have a 9 month old German Shepherd mix pupper, and she loves car rides. This protects my leather seat from her excited paws and keeps her hair in one place. I do wish it secured under the seat better as I do have to keep retucking it, but it is pretty good for a universal fit type product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Cannon

customer_reviews.title: BEST SEAT COVER I HAVE EVER BOUGHT
customer_reviews.text: I usually go to the automotive store to buy my seat covers but I decided to give this one a try it is made with heavy material there's no elastic to it it fits perfectly over your seat and has locking ends which you can tighten to fit your feet perfectly. I bought a second one absolutely love the way the seats and I have a Ford Escape
customer_reviews.author: LADY BIKER

customer_reviews.title: Great fabric, easy install
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2, 1 for each front seat. On 1 of the 2, the buckle for the head rest wouldn't stay closed. But the rest of it was just what I wanted, so I just tried it and tucked it in the headrest. But the fabric quality is great, and easy to install Just got a faulty buckle on one
customer_reviews.author: Cat and Jason

customer_reviews.title: Heading for a while now
customer_reviews.text: I threw in the trash today it takes longer to vacuum off the dog hair than it does the seat Real good set up set if you could vacuum off the dog hair off terrible material I'll put up with vacuum dog hair off my seat it's easier
customer_reviews.author: NLC

customer_reviews.title: exellent front sit protection
customer_reviews.text: Excellent car sit protection. Described very accurate, arrived in time. I have a nice vehicle, have 2 back sit protectors and I have front sit cover too. Very pleased, protect sit from dust, dog's hair and wetness. Also looks nice on the front sit.
customer_reviews.author: NataliaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what there is to complain about for eleven bucks. Bought it for an upcoming road trip with my dog, didn't want there to be dog hair all over the seat. Tightens at the head rest and around the back of the seat. Might even buy another one for the drivers seat!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Decent Covers
customer_reviews.text: They don’t fit perfect in my car, a mustang but were easy to install. They do good enough to protect the seats from my dogs. The material is easy to wipe down when mud or dirt is tracked in the car. I gave it 0 stars for durability because I have only had them for about 3 months and the strap that holds it to the back of the seat has already torn almost completely off.
customer_reviews.author: kasey

customer_reviews.title: Great for an easily car sick dog!
customer_reviews.text: My dog gets car sick easily, and has thick hair. This has saved me from needing to get my seats washed and vacuumed!
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for Jeeps!
customer_reviews.text: Great item, I wanted something to put on my passenger seat for the dog in my 2008 Jeep Grand cherokee. Just what I needed and doesn't move.
customer_reviews.author: Kelso

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Needed something for when my puppy is riding with me in my new car so she doesn't tear up the seat, but won't be using it all the time so it had to be easy to install and remove. This seat cover gets thrown on quickly with two easy snaps in the back. I can remove it easily by unsnapping and pulling it off!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: OK for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my passenger seat well and is good protection when the dog is a bit dirty or damp, but some of the quilted stitches have come out already. However, it's cheap and pretty good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: R B W

customer_reviews.title: Well made Pet seat cover.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made seat cover. Water-resistant and dirt resistant. fits the seat well. I would recommend this seat cover to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: MrGolf

customer_reviews.title: Easy for universal cover
customer_reviews.text: Great product - protects leather seats from dog’s nails Wraps around the bottom and flaps over top. Easy to take off, fold up and store.
customer_reviews.author: J. Barry

customer_reviews.title: Fits good
customer_reviews.text: Kept getting complaints from the hubs about the hair on the seat from our doggy!! Oops :) this does the job and it fits perfect on our SUV front seat
customer_reviews.author: Linda silva

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay on for even one ride.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stay on the seat at all and she doesn’t move around much. Virtually useless. Even when I reattach it every single ride it’s already slid back off mid-ride. Disappointed, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and well made just what we needed for our medium size dog but if you have a large dog this pad is plenty big enough
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not a durable product
customer_reviews.text: Not a quality made product. I have had the product 8 months washed them 3 times and there coming apart as well as they shrink with each washing. Not quite sure why they have such good ratings. I am trowing them away today.
customer_reviews.author: Flexsteel

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff
customer_reviews.text: I have found it to be too thin and stiff. I am contemplating washing it to soften it up. Our dog prefers a bare seat.
customer_reviews.author: Momgood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my vehicle. My little rescue always has some dandruff from skin allergies so this keeps my car seat clean. Easy to install and take out if not needed.
customer_reviews.author: MjPiep

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for the cost
customer_reviews.text: For $13, it does everything I need it to do. Keeps the seat clean from my adventurous dog who goes everywhere with me. I have not water tested it yet but seems like it is waterproof. Fits my 09’ Subaru Outback seats fine but not super snug although you can tighten it on the head and back parts . Material is thick canvas like material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected and so far has served its purpose. Only time will tell the full story. Recommended for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seat cover
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves to ride in the front seat with her seatbelt. This is perfect so she doesn’t get my seats all dirty after a walk.
customer_reviews.author: Fur crew

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: This is just what Loui needed to sit in the seat and look out the window. Came just as promised; appears durable and was super easy to put on the car seat.
customer_reviews.author: NOLA-SW

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and coverage
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 2014 Dodge Durango R/T, love the straps to hold it in place, anchor at the crease of the seat, covers the sides of the seat to protect from paws hanging down
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Miller

customer_reviews.title: certainly covers the seat
customer_reviews.text: neither of my dogs have torn this apart yet and it seems to clean up easily with a sponge BUT one of the plastic clips was already broken when I received this in the mail. Fixed with a little bit of duct tape so no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Raymond

customer_reviews.title: This seat cover is very thick and well made. ...
customer_reviews.text: This seat cover is very thick and well made. It holds securely to the seat. There's even a little "handle" to tuck between the top and bottom seat cushions which keeps it from sliding around.
customer_reviews.author: avidreader456

customer_reviews.title: Keeps dog hair off seat
customer_reviews.text: Easy to place over seat in car and my SUV, have to extend over for SUV seat in back. I use it under my doggie booster seat. Booster seat is one of the best purchases I bought for the beagle
customer_reviews.author: rocky

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and I like the flaps that come down around the front and the sides of the seat. I haven't had it long so I am curious to find out if it is going to be hot to sit on during the summer months.
customer_reviews.author: DEBORAH THOMAS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!!
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfect in my SUV. It was very easy to install and it protects my seats when my dog jumps up in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my gfs car since our dog kept getting her seats dirty. They worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised that it fit my Subaru Impreza passenger seat like it was made specifically for it!
customer_reviews.author: Bartholomew Cubbins

customer_reviews.title: easy to protect leather seats
customer_reviews.text: quick delivery, easy to install, look great on leather seats. Good protection from a very active little dog. Thanks. I'll be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Thorne

customer_reviews.title: Fits well in my Nissan Juke
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. So easy to install fits like a glove. I have two small Chihuahuas and it should be a great help on trips.
customer_reviews.author: Fern

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I rotate my grandson & lab in the front seat, so the seat cover comes off & on a lot. It is easy to install and it keeps my seat clean. It fits my Subaru forrester nicely
customer_reviews.author: Prof Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple design that is durable and blends well with my car interior. It does the trick and I am worry free about dirty seats.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay on
customer_reviews.text: Aside from a clip to attach this cover to the headrest, there's nothing to keep it in place. Every time my dog sits on it, it works its way off the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Medium-Short Person

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit right on my Jeep Wrangler seat, too small to cover around the bottom of the seat so it sticks up and my dog does not like sitting on it
customer_reviews.author: Anna Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh I absolutely love this! My pup has been riding with a towel for the last few months, and it wasn’t practical. This seat cover is perfect for my Nissan, and it makes clean up super easy!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: It is just the best and great price for that so perfectly for my dog riding in my ne car with me now
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for all my needs for my dog riding in my new car with me. Fits better then I thought it would and is just what needed to keeping the seat clean. So nice to be able to take off and wash dry and have for my car to keep clean then. Needing to get something like this for my back seat too😃
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Great price, amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this from a referral from a friend. I am not disappointed. It fits snugly over my passenger front seat and still gives a comfortable feel when sitting in it. It is affordable and holds up to people and dogs. I like it so much I ordered one for the drivers seat as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bryson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the trips to the mechanics or the beach
customer_reviews.text: I hate how dirty mechanic's uniforms get my clear interior. Now with this tool, my seats remain clean. Likewise, great for post beach activities...or any other water related activities. I have light grey leather seats....can't afford to have them wet or sand on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Pierre DeBarros

customer_reviews.title: dog cover
customer_reviews.text: was ok but not for the car I had in mind will put in another car which will work better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality seat cover and easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: This seat cover seems to be of good quality. Haven’t had any liquid spill on it so I can’t rate it on water resistantance, but it seems nice and was easy to put on my passenger seat of my Hyundai Sonata.
customer_reviews.author: Dailey

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke right away
customer_reviews.text: I really like the seat cover for my wet muddy dog, But the first time I took it out of the car to wash it, The strap broke and started to unravel. It never made it to the wash before I had to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my car and my dog that sheds a lot of hair
customer_reviews.author: hilda

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something simple this was it, would have preferred leather but this will do.
customer_reviews.author: RussellRuyack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seat protection!
customer_reviews.text: Quality and appearance are excellent! Once you get the back strapped in place it’s tornado proof. The bottom has no straps and is prone to moving out of place. Come up with straps for the bottom and it would be unbeatable! Still satisfied with my purchase but with will be adding some sort of bottom straps
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Easy install with good fit, Chev Silverado PU. Just ordered another.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer1

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for dogs and beach days!
customer_reviews.text: Great seat covers just a little stiff, but that is because waterproof so not really a complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I thought this was good until I washed it.
customer_reviews.text: I washed this and it was threadbare and falling apart. I can see sunlight through it.
customer_reviews.author: crafty lady

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality seat cover at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Works good but not exact fit but should in time
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted for my 2018 Ram 2500 but hoping they will stretch out a tid bit in time. Other wise very happy and they do what they say. Keeps my leather clean and in good condition. Works fine with seat warmers too.
customer_reviews.author: Dave A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them, they look great and work great. And I just machine wash them and hang dry.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Great seat covers
customer_reviews.text: Those is so perfect for your car seat. It’s easy to put in your car seat and doesn’t move. It’s also perfect for water resistant. I have a Rava4 2019 and it fits great in my seats.
customer_reviews.author: MSPacheco

customer_reviews.title: Less hair everywhere, no accidents on upholstery.
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Fits the front passenger seat of my VW Golf just fine. Much better than just the towel I was previously using!
customer_reviews.author: Truly Julie

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Easy/Quick to install and de-install making them great for seats that sometimes get used for people. Works well with our dog and keeps the seats clean.
customer_reviews.author: writeZoe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Very easy to put in your car and adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt fit at all but it gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat for your pet!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect, it takes about 30secs to put on. Highly durable yet comfortable for your pet while keeping your seats clean.
customer_reviews.author: NK - Austin

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price. It fits my Camry well and keeps my seat clean
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2015 Jeep Cherokee and this car seat cover fit like a glove!!! No problems whatsoever. Great Storefront, great prices and great items. Will be doing business again, I'm sure of it. AAA+++ Thank you for a great product
customer_reviews.author: SCampOKC

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not for an F150
customer_reviews.text: So this does not fit the front seat of an F150. I had to cut the corners to make it work. Would be nice if it had anchors for the front, but then again I probably wouldn’t need them had it fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Latham

customer_reviews.title: Prefect
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy right out of the package. All you need
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I have a Subaru Forester and it fit perfectly over the passenger seat. Easy to get in and out and it stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Save your auto interior!!! Buy today.
customer_reviews.text: My Sam loves his seat cover. Keeps him from sticking to the leather seat and keeps me happy he isnt scratching my non fabric seats
customer_reviews.author: anewuser

customer_reviews.title: Good for messy ppl
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my moms car cuz she always be spilling stuff and making a mess.
customer_reviews.author: MizzWicked

customer_reviews.title: Great seat cover!
customer_reviews.text: Great seat cover! Easy to put in and out of car. I love that it doesn’t blow around when the windows are down because of the skirt around the seat and back clip.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Protects Leather
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and it protects my leather seats.
customer_reviews.author: John

product_meta.title: pedy Pet Front Seat Cover for Cars, Dog Car Seat Cover, Nonslip Rubber Backing with Anchors, Black
product_meta.description:
PEDY Pet Dog Front Seat Cover 600D Heavy Duty Water-Resistant Scratch Proof Nonslip Durable Machine Washable for Cars Trucks and SUVs 

Heavy Duty Material
Pedy dog front seat cover is made from 4 layers of fabrics: 600D water-resistant oxford fabric + A grade PP cotton + 210D oxford cloth + slip-proof PVC net; comprehensively protecting your car safe from pet claws, stains and liquids.


Perfect Fitting
Pet front seat cover is perfect for standard cars, trucks & SUVs. Reinforced 3 sides skirt cover instead of just 1 side from other sellers make your front seat foolproof protection in all domains.

Upgraded Protection
Dog seat cover front with double quick-release buckle & Non-slip rubber backing & seat anchors make sure that your pet stays still and neat even during quick turns and speed bumps.

Easy to Clean & Install
Front seat cover for dogs is very easy to install and remove in 30 seconds. Suitable for mashine washinable in gentle cycle or wipe it with damp cloth.

Specifications
Weight: 500g
Size: 100cm(L)x52(W)
Material: 600D oxford cloth + PP cotton + 210D oxford cloth + Sip-proof PVC net

How to use?

1.Simply snap buckle straps around the headrest & backrest.
2.Insert seat anchor in between seat cushions.
3.Dress the bottom seat skirt.
4.Adjust the reinforced headrest & backrest straps to tailor the fit to your front seat.

Water-Resistant:In order to avoid ingress of moisture and soiling your car mat, it is recommended to dry it as soon as possible after wetting.
feature_bullets: [Perfect Fit]:Pet front seat cover measures 39.4"(L)x19.6"(W)x7"(H) is designed for the front seats of all standard cars, trucks & SUVs. Not only for your lovely pet, but also for child & human.

[Premium Material]:Made with high quality water-resistant heavy-duty polyester for durability. 4 layered water-resistant material: 600D oxford cloth + A grade PP cotton + 210D oxford cloth middle + slip-proof PVC net, defend your front seats against muddy paws, dirty debris, dog hairs and scratches.

[Upgrade Security]:Includes double quick-release buckle that arounds headrest & backrest and built-in rubber nonslip backing & seat anchors to prevent seat cover from sliding around. Reinforced three sides skirt cover makes your front seat foolproof protection.
[Easy Install & Clean]:Dog front car seat cover is easy install and remove in 30 seconds. Mashine Washinable in Gentle Cycle or wipe it with damp cloth.
[5 Stars Service]:We will provide 7/24 online Customer Service. 12 Month extended service and 30 days full refund for purchase from PEDY.
